description: The iDM15 is a compact portable stereo speaker solution with Bluetooth-enabled audio streaming and speakerphone capability. Speakers connect to a computer or other USB power source via the included USB cable to recharge the internal lithium-ion battery. You can pair your Bluetooth-capable device to enjoy audio, or listen to any audio device that has a 3.5 mm headphone jack. Perfect for laptops, cell phones, iPad, iPhone, iPod and other MP3 players, any audio source! Cables and a sturdy travel case are included.
title: iHome iDM15 Rechargeable Portable Bluetooth Speakers with Speakerphone
